mapper.select: SELECT 'DOCRM' AS SYS_CD, '收件管理系統' AS SYS_NM FROM DOCRMT121 ORDER BY FUNCTION_ID
SELECT DISTINCT 'DOCRM' AS SYS_CD, LEVEL_CODE, LEVEL_NM FROM DOCRMT121 INNER JOIN DOCRMT122 ON DOCRMT121.FUNCTION_ID = DOCRMT122.FUNCTION_ID WHERE GROUP_ID=#{GROUP_ID}

SELECT DISTINCT 'DOCRM' AS SYS_CD, LEVEL_CODE, LEVEL_NM, SUBSTR(DOCRMT121.FUNCTION_ID,6,3) AS LABEL_CD, DOCRMT121.FUNCTION_ID AS PRG_CD, FUNCTION_NM AS PRG_NM FROM DOCRMT121 INNER JOIN DOCRMT122 ON DOCRMT121.FUNCTION_ID = DOCRMT122.FUNCTION_ID WHERE GROUP_ID=#{GROUP_ID}
